text: Chapu may refer to: ==Geography== *Chapu, Iran, a village in West Azerbaijan Province, Iran *Zhapu, formerly romanized as Chapu, a seaport in China ==People== *Henri Chapu (1833–1891), French sculptor *Andrés Nocioni (born 1979), Philadelphia 76ers forward nicknamed "Chapu" *Chapu (entertainer), stage name of Chilean entertainer Francisco Javier Puelles Gana (born 1984) ==Other uses== *Chapo (beverage), Peruvian beverage made from boiled plantain with cinnamon and clove *Battle of Chapu, fought between British and Chinese forces in Chapu (Zhapu), China, in 1842 during the First Opium War
title: Chapu
